item.title: [508] MerlinScape {HD} - Me First RS2 Release: ENJOY
item.dc:creator: @gtree01 gtree01
item.description:
@gtree01 wrote:

[quote=“tehjamdude, post:48, topic:441074”][quote author=gtree01 link=topic=543752.msg3986400#msg3986400 date=1335926506]

EDIT: NVM. WinZip didn’t extract the entire file. haha. I will update this post later!!

Actually I was attacking a regular man in Lumbridge. Where also “death” showed up and said something… I love the looks of this but I want to fix it!!

Seems like everything worked for you then?

Sadly it did not!
Okay so I tried this out. None of the NPC’s work? When I attack stuff it does the ice barrage, and overall nothing responds/works? Did I get a bad download?
[/quote]

ahh… then that would be when you are attacking demons? There were originally demons there from the un-edited server, I might have forgotten to remove them sorry… NPC do work you’ll just have to make sure your not attacking a demon[/quote]

Read full topic

Seems like everything worked for you then?

[/quote]
Sadly it did not!
Okay so I tried this out. None of the NPC’s work? When I attack stuff it does the ice barrage, and overall nothing responds/works? Did I get a bad download?[/quote]

ahh… then that would be when you are attacking demons? There were originally demons there from the un-edited server, I might have forgotten to remove them sorry… NPC do work you’ll just have to make sure your not attacking a demon
